name: GENOMIC ANSWERS FOR CHILDRENS HEALTH ALLIANCE (GACHA)
description: A multi-sector, consensus-based policy and advocacy alliance.
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Work with Congress and the Administration to expand Medicaid coverage of whole genome sequencing for children with rare diseases.
